name: forward-logs
description: Forwards the stdout and stderr of a command to a websocket server, as defined by environment variables.

scripts.build-release: tsc && gulp && nexe -t linux-x64 -o dist/linux-x64/forward-logs && nexe -t windows-x64 -o dist/windows-x64/forward-logs.exe && nexe -t alpine-x64 -o dist/alpine-x64/forward-logs
